title: Interrogation.Dream3.Start
body:
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
We know how this is going to go
You're smarter than the others you know
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
I don't think you belong here 
not like the others
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
So lets work together
you help us out, and we'll help you out
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
I think I can arrange a work transfer
You know you won't survive much longer in those caves
Don't be a dummy now
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot3>>
....
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
Not going to talk huh?
Going to be a brave one too?
I thought you were smart
<<returnToCampScene DialogAndPortraitContainer>>
